name: Jim's Revenge 3
description:
Controls:
- Right Arrow Key to move right
- Left Arrow  Key to move left
- Up, Z, or X Key to jump
- Space or C to shoot
_____________________________________________     

     Story:
After Jim killed The Second In Command he went home to watch TV. But suddenly Jim was kidnapped by The Enemies, not only was Jim in danger but The Evil Scientist had created mutants. Now Jim is going to take them down once and for all.
_____________________________________________

     Gun Names:
- Mr. Pew (Blue Gun)
- Shooty Mic Shoot (Red Gun)
- Happiness (Green Gun)
- Banana Split (Yellow Gun)
- Ball Of Power (Purple Gun)
_____________________________________________

     Character Names:
- Jim (Player)
- Enemy (Enemy)
- The Evil Scientist (Boss)
_____________________________________________

     Cheat Codes:
- (at any time in game) hold down J, I, M on the keyboard. if performed correctly a box should appear. Type into the box any of the codes listed bellow.

"UCPA" = play as Jazz Westly 
(From: Space attack! - U.C.P.A.)

"mr.pew" = gives you Mr. Pew

"shooty mic shoot" = gives you Shooty Mic Shoot

"happiness" = gives you Happiness

"banana split" = gives you Banana Split

"ball of power" = gives you Ball Of Power

"infh" = infinite health
